param.name: returnhome
param.comment: Return Home after completing a trade?

param.name: minbuy
param.comment: Min gate distance to buy. Buy range supported if $minbuy and $maxbuy are provided

param.name: maxbuy
param.comment: Max gate distance to buy. Buy range supported if $minbuy and $maxbuy are provided

param.name: minsell
param.comment: Min gate distance to sell. Sell range supported if $minsell and $maxsell are provided

param.name: maxsell
param.comment: Max gate distance to sell. Sell range supported if $minsell and $maxsell are provided

param.name: distancecheck
param.comment: Should we compare distances between trade deals?

param.name: distancecheckpercent
param.comment: How much of a penalty each jump is.

param.name: discount
param.comment: How much we pay at stations.

param.name: discount2
param.comment: How much we pay at stations.

param.name: bypass
param.comment: Do we ignore faction restrictions on owned stations?

param.name: fasttrade
param.comment: Attempt to optimise the search engine by skipping deals we deem improfitable.

param.name: stationmode
param.comment: When enabled, toggles the trader into station trader mode.

param.name: blackmarket
param.comment: When enabled, allows the trader to trade illegal wares when in station trader mode.

param.name: allwares
param.comment: Enable all wares in the basket.

param.name: largelegalwares
param.comment: Enable all large volume legal wares.

param.name: mediumlegalwares
param.comment: Enable all medium volume legal wares.

param.name: smalllegalwares
param.comment: Enable all small volume legal wares.

param.name: excludedsectors
param.comment: Sectors the player wants excluded from trade searches.

param.name: includedsectors
param.comment: Sectors the player wants included in trade searches.

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Sector Restrictions detected!'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Removing '+$buyspaces.{$sector}.knownname+' from BuySpaces'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Removing '+$sellspaces.{$sector}.knownname+' from SellSpaces'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Adding WhiteListed Sectors to the sector list!'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Sectors in Range Buy: '+$buyspaces.count+' Sell: '+$sellspaces.count

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Scanning CargoBay: '+$Cargo.count

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'CargoBay Contains: '+$Cargo.{$ware}+' Amount: '+this.ship.cargo.{$Cargo.{$ware}}.count

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Buy Offer for: '+$buyoffer.ware+' at '+$buyoffer.buyer.knownname+' Amount: '+$Amount+' DesiredAmount: '+$buyoffer.desiredamount+' OfferAmount: '+$buyoffer.offeramount+' Stock: '+$buyoffer.stocklevel+' Profit: '+ $Amount*$buycost+' Payout: '+$buycost+' Distance: '+$distance+' DistanceScale: '+$distancescale+' Scaled: '+$totalearned+' HighestGrofit: '+$Grofit+' Available: '+$buyoffer.available+' Restricted: '+$buyoffer.restriction.factions.count+' MinAmount: '+$buyoffer.minamount+' IsMission: '+$buyoffer.ismission+' IsExchange: '+$buyoffer.iswareexchange+' FreeSpace: '+$buyoffer.buyer.cargo.{$buyoffer.ware}.free+' CommandersMoney: '+$buyoffer.buyer.money+' Exists: '+$buyoffer.exists+' Ware Illegal: '+$buyoffer.ware.illegalto.{$buyoffer.buyer.owner}.{null}

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Selling '+$Gromount+' '+$GrofferBuy.ware+' for '+$GrofferBuy.unitprice/100+' at '+$GrofferBuy.buyer.knownname+' DealAvailiability: '+$GrofferBuy.available

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Station has: '+$stationselloffers.count+' sell offers and '+$stationbuyoffers.count+' buy offers.'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Sell Offer: '+$stationselloffer.ware+' Price: '+$stationselloffer.unitprice/100+' SellFree: '+$stationselloffer.sellfree.{this.ship}+' Stock: '+$stationselloffer.stocklevel*100+'% Priority: '+$offerpriority

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Scanning for buy offers! Found: '+$foundbuyers.count

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Scanning buy offer for ('+$foundbuyoffer.ware+') at ('+$foundbuyoffer.buyer.knownname+') Price: '+$wareprice+' Amount: '+$foundbuyoffer.amount+' Faction: '+$foundbuyoffer.buyer.owner+' Restriction: '+$foundbuyoffer.restriction.factions.count+' Raw OfferPrice: '+$foundbuyoffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$foundbuyoffer.buyer.relationto.{this.ship.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+$home.gatedistance.{$foundbuyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+$home.distanceto.{$foundbuyoffer.buyer}

do_if.value: (this.ship.commander.hasownaccount) and (this.ship.commander.defaultorder == null or this.ship.commander.defaultorder.id != 'TaterTrade') and (this.ship.commander.money gt 0)

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Selling: ('+$stationselloffer.ware+') Best Deal: ('+$bestdeal.buyer.knownname+') Price: '+$bestdeal.unitprice/100+' Profit: '+$profit+' Amount: ( '+$bestamount+' / '+$WareCapacity+' Max) Priority: '+$offerpriority+' GateDistance: '+$home.gatedistance.{$bestdeal.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' StockLevel: '+$stationselloffer.stocklevel*100+'% CargoFill: '+(($bestamount)f/($WareCapacity)f)*100+'%'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'BuyerName: ('+$stationbuyoffer.buyer.knownname+') Is Build Storage: '+$isbuildstorage+' Ware: '+$stationbuyoffer.ware+' Price: '+$stationbuyoffer.unitprice/100+' BuyFree: '+$stationbuyoffer.buyfree.{this.ship}+' Stock: '+$stationbuyoffer.stocklevel*100+'% Desired Amount: '+$stationbuyoffer.desiredamount+' Priority: '+$offerpriority

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'I found '+$foundseller.count+' sell offers for '+$stationbuyoffer.ware

do_if.value: (this.ship.commander.hasownaccount) and (this.ship.commander.defaultorder == null or this.ship.commander.defaultorder.id != 'TaterTrade') and (this.ship.commander.money gt 0)

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Scanning sell offer for ( '+$Amount+' '+$stationbuyoffer.ware+' ) at ('+$foundselloffer.seller.knownname+') Price: '+$wareprice+' Faction: '+$foundselloffer.seller.owner+' Restriction: '+$foundselloffer.restriction.factions.count+' Raw OfferPrice: '+$foundselloffer.unitprice/100+' BuyAmount: '+$stationbuyoffer.amount+' SellAmount: '+$foundselloffer.amount

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Buying: ('+$stationbuyoffer.ware+') Best Deal: ('+$bestdeal.seller.knownname+') Price: '+$bestprice+' Amount: ( '+$bestamount+' / '+$WareCapacity+' Max) Priority: '+$offerpriority+' GateDistance: '+$home.gatedistance.{$bestdeal.seller}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' StockLevel: '+$stationbuyoffer.stocklevel*100+'% CargoFill: '+(($bestamount)f/($WareCapacity)f)*100+'%'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Station Trader Trade found!'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: '\nNo Wares Detected! Resetting to start! Log File Version: 10'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Searching for trade deals'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Checking offers for ware: '+$usedwarebasket.{$ware}

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'I found these offers nearby, Buy: '+$buyoffers.count+' Sell: '+$selloffers.count

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Scanning buy offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$buyoffer.buyer.knownname+') Price: '+$buycost+' Faction: '+$buyoffer.buyer.owner+' Restriction: '+$buyoffer.restriction.factions.count+' Raw OfferPrice: '+$buyoffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$buyoffer.buyer.relationto.{this.ship.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+this.ship.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+this.ship.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}

do_if.value: (this.ship.commander.hasownaccount) and (this.ship.commander.defaultorder == null or this.ship.commander.defaultorder.id != 'TaterTrade') and (this.ship.commander.money gt 0)

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Scanning sell offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$selloffer.seller.knownname+') Faction: ('+$selloffer.seller.owner+') Restriction: ('+$selloffer.restriction.factions+') Buying at '+$buycost+' Selling at '+$sellcost+' Average: '+$buyoffer.ware.averageprice/100+' Amount: '+$Amount+' Grofit: '+ $Amount*($buycost-$sellcost)+' Ratio: '+$Ratio+' Rating: '+$Rating+' RawSellOffer Price: '+$selloffer.unitprice/100+' Relation: '+$selloffer.seller.relationto.{this.ship.owner}+' Gate Distance: '+$selloffer.seller.gatedistance.{$buyoffer.buyer}.{$blacklistgroup}.{this.assignedcontrolled}+' Distance Raw: '+$selloffer.seller.distanceto.{$buyoffer.buyer}+' Distance Scale: '+$distancescale

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: ' Scanning sell offer for ('+$buyoffer.ware+') at ('+$bestsell.seller.knownname+') Faction: ('+$bestsell.seller.owner+') Restriction: ('+$bestsell.restriction.factions+') Buying at '+$buycost+' Selling at '+$sellcost+' Average: '+$buyoffer.ware.averageprice/100+' Amount: '+$Amount+' Grofit: '+ $Amount*($buycost-$sellcost)

do_if.value: (this.ship.commander.hasownaccount) and (this.ship.commander.defaultorder == null or this.ship.commander.defaultorder.id != 'TaterTrade') and (this.ship.commander.money gt 0)

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Checking if we can afford this deal! Money: '+$spendablemoney+' TotalCost: '+($itemcostsell*$Gromount)+' PerCost: '+$itemcostsell

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Buying '+$Gromount+' '+$GrofferSell.ware+' for '+$itemcostsell+' at '+$GrofferSell.seller.knownname+' then '+'Selling '+$Gromount+' '+$GrofferBuy.ware+' for '+$itemcostbuy+' at '+$GrofferBuy.buyer.knownname

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Looks like the trade were looking at is no longer available.'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'We cant afford this deal anymore'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Order: '+this.ship.order.id+' Failed to find a trade ' + $SearchFailed + ' times. Waiting before checking again.'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Order: '+this.ship.order.id+' Failed to find a trade ' + $SearchFailed + ' times. Waiting before checking again.'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Order: '+this.ship.order.id+' Failed to find a trade ' + $SearchFailed + ' times. Notifying player.'

debug_text.text: 'MOD: TaterTrader -- %1 -- Ship: %2 -- Trade failure procedures failed: %3'.[player.age,this.ship.idcode,if $SearchFailed? then $SearchFailed else 'Null',if $GrofitFound? then $GrofitFound else 'Null', if $StationTrade then $StationTrade else 'Null']

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Order: '+this.ship.order.id+' State: '+this.ship.order.state

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Commencing Order: '+this.ship.order.id

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Orders Should of finished by now.'

debug_to_file.name: this.ship.idcode
debug_to_file.text: 'Resetting Log File Version: 10'
